Hello together!

I want to start a new project with very much training data=
. 

Doing some tests, currently I need for one generation about 347 days.
T=
hat's a bit too long :-)

Do you know tricks to handle that amount of data?=

Or should I just select per random one million datasets and only use these=
?

Thank you,

Christian
